section.44: The Book of the Merits of the Companions

hadiths.text: Khufaf b. Jura' reported that Allah's Messenger (ï·º) said in prayer:O Allah, hurl curse upon the tribe of Lihyan and Ri'l aid Dhakwan and Usayya for they disobeyed Allah and His Messenger, (and for) Ghifar Allah has granted pardon and for the tribe of Aslam Allah has granted safety
